description: A great weekend dinner, this crispy-skinned barramundi pops alongside a minty, spicy pineapple and tomato salsa.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pineapple,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Crispy-skinned Barramundi With Pineapple Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 small pineapple, peeled and cored, diced
1 long red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pat fish skin dry with paper towels.
Preheat barbecue plate on medium high. Brush barramundi fillets with oil. Cook for 6 minutes skin-side down. Flip and cook for 4 minutes, or until just cooked through.

Meanwhile, juice 2 limes. Combine pineapple, onion, tomato, mint, chilli and lime juice in a bowl, then season. Place spinach on a large tray and top with fish and salsa. Cut remaining lime into cheeks and serve with fish.
